title: Writing A Page-Turner: Five Editing Maxims to Make Your Book Irresistible
description: Want to write a book that readers won't be able to put down?This book brings you the qualities necessary to turn your writing into an addictive reading experience that your fans will love. From keeping your story simple to staying in the character's head, a highly experienced editor and a best-selling author will take you through the essential steps to creating propulsive and entertaining fiction. Also includes an additional 'Musings From the Writer's Desk'
author: Self Publishing Formula
